about_the_game:
The biggest breakthrough in gold mining since the invention of the wash plant! This mobile conveyor belt will save you a lot of time and fuel.



It has never been possible to sift gold particles so thoroughly before. Using the latest technology, we managed to obtain almost 100% of the gold extraction from the processed earth.



The most powerful trommel of this season. Thanks to the reinforced frame and the use of prototype material, unprecedented performance has been achieved.



Old Arnold may not be in his prime age, but his machines are still working good. This trommel may not look the most attractive, but its performance far exceeds the basic models.



At first glance, the gravel pump does not differ much from the jig. However, the differences in their structure have a huge impact on performance, which is better in the pump.



Do not let her appearance deceive you. It may not look like a technologically advanced machine, but it does its job well and is a suitable jig replacement for a lower price.
detailed_description:
The biggest breakthrough in gold mining since the invention of the wash plant! This mobile conveyor belt will save you a lot of time and fuel.



It has never been possible to sift gold particles so thoroughly before. Using the latest technology, we managed to obtain almost 100% of the gold extraction from the processed earth.



The most powerful trommel of this season. Thanks to the reinforced frame and the use of prototype material, unprecedented performance has been achieved.



Old Arnold may not be in his prime age, but his machines are still working good. This trommel may not look the most attractive, but its performance far exceeds the basic models.



At first glance, the gravel pump does not differ much from the jig. However, the differences in their structure have a huge impact on performance, which is better in the pump.



Do not let her appearance deceive you. It may not look like a technologically advanced machine, but it does its job well and is a suitable jig replacement for a lower price.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Attention, attention! Gold prospectors from all plots, unite! The large delivery is heading towards the Shop with Heavy Equipment. You will find machines that will change the concept of gold mining.
supported_languages: English, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
